alert.note: Alert for Osage; Pawnee; Rogers; Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 7:15PM CDT until July 14 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ROGERS...SOUTHERN OSAGE...SOUTHERN WASHINGTON AND PAWNEE COUNTIES... At 715 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ochelata to 3 miles north of Hominy to 6 miles northeast of Morrison, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Pawhuska... Pawnee... Hominy... Cleveland... Fairfax... Barnsdall... Oologah... Ramona... Wynona... Ochelata... Ralston... Avant... Talala... Vera... Blackburn... Skedee... Okesa... Tallant... Pershing... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
